todos.title: Feedback Through Rhetorical Questions
todos.body: “Do you think it’s a good idea to…?” or “We need to have this done by… Do you think….?”

todos.title: Behavior
todos.body: Give feedback on behavior or things that people can change, not someone’s personality or looks.

todos.title: Timing
todos.body: Get to know what is going on in their life so that you can give feedback when they don’t have other issues and can let it soak in.

todos.title: Personality
todos.body: Feelers will take feedback much worse than thinkers.  Two-thirds of women are feelers.

todos.title: Tough Love
todos.body: Begin with “I say this with love…”

todos.title: Place
todos.body: Appraise in public, give feedback in private.
